chat.title: preamble
chat.message: - at UHNBC there is an physician on-call for SA and no nurse examiner so not sure if this should be removed or wording change

chat.title: formatting
chat.message:
- more user friendly if each condition and options are individually separate eg Ghon and Chlamydia - options
-next line - HIV PEP - options
-next line - Hep B - options
 - and so on

chat.title: links
chat.message:
-links to services for patient and care provider (Pathways)
- yellow text - medical legal responsibilities and pitfalls
reminders for ordering repeat STI testing in the future from this exposure and transmission precautions till those tests are complete
